text:
Two Weeks Online Faculty Development Program (FDP) on Implementing IoT and Deep Learning Applications on Edge Devices organized by Electronics & ICT Academy, NIT Warangal in Association with Department of Electronics and Communication Engineering, VNR Vignana Jyothi Institute of Engineering & Technology (VNR VJIET), Hyderabad, Telangana
Resource Persons: Eminent Professors from IITs/NITs/IIITs and Experts from Industry
FDP Dates: 15th – 25th July 2024 (Four hours per day)
Registration link:
https://forms.gle/mo2GnBshRFQRo2ov6
Last date for registration: 12-07-2024
Course Fee Details:
Faculty and Research Scholars: ₹ 1000/-
Industry Participants: ₹ 2250/-
Online payment details:
Account Name: Electronics & ICT Academy NITW
Account No: 62423775910
IFSC: SBIN0020149
Bank and Branch: State Bank of India, NIT(REC) Warangal
Note:
I request everyone; please circulate this brochure to other colleges/friends to post it in their various college groups.
Contact Person:
Dr. Ranjan Kumar Senapati, Professor, Department of ECE, VNR VJIET Hyderabad-500067, (Telangana State), Email: ranjan_ks@vnrvjiet.in, Mobile: 8309442981
